mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user VALUES (#{user_no}, #{user_id}, #{user_pwd}, #{user_name}, null, null, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_id=#{user_id}, user_pwd=#{user_pwd}, user_name=#{user_name}, user_email=null, user_phone_number=null, user_rdate=NOW() WHERE user_no=#{user_no}
mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.user_name, i.item_name, i.price, od.count AS 개수, (i.price*od.count) as total from user u INNER JOIN orders o ON u.user_no = o.user_no INNER JOIN orderdetail od ON o.order_no = od.order_no INNER JOIN item i ON od.Item_no=i.item_no WHERE u.user_id=#{user_id}
